title: Moderate hotel
text: First time visited the village and i get surprised by the sea view. We like very much the swimming pool area, especially the kids and that outside of the room is full of grass and they could play. We got halfboard and the buffet was good enough, so as the drinks from pool bar. The drinks prices were very reasonables. The best in the hotel was the behavior and the kindness of all the staff. The only negative is that the room are not very clean, full of insects and some furniture needs to change.

title: Coffee by the sea
text: The restaurant are just next to the sea and is wonderful. Specially if you visited at night and sit under the trees. Here you can watch football matches and close by is a kids plauground so is ideal for families. The food is ok not the best.

title: Bad service
text: We visited the restaurant few days ago. We order 3 steaks and one Burger. They brought the steaks and after half hour the Burger didn't Come. We ask for it and they brought after 40 min. We asked them for ketchup 3 times and because they didn't bring we borrow one from the next table. The same with beers... wait for them for over 30min even we 've told the waiter twice. Asking the waiter why is that happening he answer us that they are only 2 waiters for 70 persons...so bad servise

title: Great as always
text: We visited again this summer as we do every year. The kids have fun as every time but as i see some of the toddlers rides had higher price.

title: Average pub
text: Not bad traditional english pub. I got a coctail drink not the best one. Their prices are reasonable and you can watch athletic matches here.

title: Good with friendly staff
text: We get there for a night drink. They offered lot of choices in alcohool drinks but also in coffees. The prices are reasonable. Recommended

title: Ideal for families
text: We love our stay in this hotel with our boys 4 and 7yrs. The pools are amazing especially for kids and the waterslides were open specific hours with lifeguards on duty. The hotel staff waw polite and friendly especially with the children. Our room was clean and big enough. We had half board and the buffet was delicious.

title: We enjoy it
text: We visited pizza express at westfield mall and because all the other areas were too crowned we sat here. We enjoy the food, we try three different pizzas and lasagna. The pizzas were big ang we really like them. The staff was helpfull and polite. For the kids they had drawing pages and crayons. Reasonable prices

title: New one
text: We visited Platres to stay just for one night. They were only 2 restaurants open for the night so we decided to try this one. We went at early evening so we sit next to the log fire. The decor inside is not very good. We had a mixed local starters for two, mexican burger, pork steak, spagghetti bolognese and two kids pasta. Everything was excellent and fresh from the salad, the meat and.....the chips. No frozen chips for sure.The kids pasta were as big as the adults one. The portions are big enough for sure. The prices are reasonable and the owner gave us the drinks for free (no alcoohol). They also had cartoon on tv and that was the best for kids. As we learn they just open the place so keep up the good work.

title: All under one roof
text: Visit the mall for second time as tourist at Christmas...this year wasn't decorated as good as other years but ok you can shop everything under one roof, a lot of cafe, restaurants etc. Easy to access with public transportation

title: Love the burgers
text: I visited this restaurant for first time with my kids. Big portions, love the burgers, the kids enjoy chicken nuggets and the prices are good. Is very close to Covent Garden and is a nice choise in the area. Very friendly and welcome staff

title: Trusted company
text: I 've been in London a lot of times but that was the first time with kids so i decided to get a taxi from/to Gatwick airport and Central London. Found the company online, you pay online and their prices are very good. Drivers were on time with clean and safe cars. Highly recommended

title: No problem
text: Flight again with easy jet was ok as every time. The staff was polite and helpfull, flights to and from London were on time. The aeroplane wasn't very clean. This is the only time that i flight with easy jet and when we asked for a specific sandwich from the menu they told us that only one kind of sandwich they have because all the other had been sold. Of at the flight from London to Larnaca we bought food and drinks from airport something that i recommended because is much cheaper.

title: Still worth it!
text: That was the 4rth time that i visited the museum and is still nice experience when you visit London. For 1st time i visited the museum with kids but they also love the experience. Remember to stand in line in cloakroom first and leave there your staff, even the jackets. If you have stroller they keep it there for free. We stand the line for about 10-15 min and after we get in. From the beggining we bought the 30p package to have all our photos digital. The musseum every time is full but you can see and photo any figure you want, that was never problem for me. The kids love the avengers area and of course Star wars is amazing. The only negative for me is that the most photos we had digital are not good. The photographers of the museum tooks a photos and not check if is good or not. We stand for 30 min. at queue to get photographed with "The Rock" and the staff didn't even told us to hold up the kids and they dont feet in the photo because the photocamera is on the ceiling. very disappointed with their photos but ok general we have fun and like it as always.
place: Magical London Pass Including Madame Tussauds London, The London Eye, SEA LIFE London, The London Dungeon and Shrekâ€™s Adventure! London

title: worth it!
text: Even on renovation you have to visit Big Ben and of course the whole building, not just the clock. Go to the other side of the bridge to have a more nice view

title: Adorable Petite shops
text: Covent Garden is overy touristed area and when i visited it at Christmas time was very crowned. The shops are small but you can find unique things inside. The area has beautiful lights, ornamental decorations,a big Christmas tree and street music but as i say prepare for crown. The only negative are the seating areas for the restaurants which are limited, even at non christmas time, but at nearby strreet you can find a lot of choises fron eat and drink. Covent Garden is worth seeing if you've never visited.

title: Visit it for sure!
text: I visited the museum with my two kids and adore it. The exhibitions inside are amazing especially the dinosaur and zoo area. The blue whale skeleton is amazing and also like that they have a lot of dinosaur skeleton hanging from ceiling. Visit it especially with kids they have a lot to learn. The entrance is free and that's why the museum is too crown from the very morning but if you' re patience you gonna see everything. There is also a shop in the museum and another one close to dinosaur section especially for kids who love dinos!

title: Enjoy the food every time
text: I visit this restaurant quite and the last years with the kids even more.The food is amazing, tasty and the portions big enough. Also their service is the bid advantage they have. Prices are very good, kids love all plates from kids menu. I really recommend it.

title: Love the atmosphere
text: One of my favourite coffee flavour...love the atmosphere of the this coffee shop. Is not expensive so give a try

title: Love IKEA
text: Best experience in shopping...but i love to visit it with my kids they adore the playground. The food in the restaurant is so value for money.

title: family friendly
text: Love to visit this chinese restaurant with my two kids...very friendly, nice food and reasonable prices

title: Good choise
text: New addition in the mall and love the outside area....the food is delicious as in all ocean basket restaurants in cyprus. Recommend to try their platters. Prices are good also

title: Kids love it
text: The best addition after Mall renovation...kids and adults also, love the ice cream and shop decoration. I only suggest to have 2-3 tables to have a sit because there is lot of place empty into the shop. Recommended

title: Nice renovation
text: After the renovation of the mall this year the area of the restaurant and cafe totally change...is amazing especially if you sit outside. Also love the kids area with arcades was time for it and Hansel&Gretel.

title: Best pizza
text: I tried the pizza and love it...is big enough for two and reasonable prices. Love the decor inside. Their service is a little bit slow

title: Nice location
text: The rooms as the whole hotel is clean and tidy. Comfortable bed, flat tv, safe box. The staff was polite and very helpfull. The waitress staff on the rooftop restaurant was very friendly. The breakfast is buffet with basic food but you can choose from their menu to order fried eggs, bacon, scrabble eggs, omelette, etc. Love the scrabble eggs with feta! It was so delicious! The best is hotel location. You can walk from there all over the city. Monastiraki and Psyrris squares are a few minutes distance from there. However, you can also take the metro which is very close if you want to and get in mind that one of the Metro entries is on Athinas street. The only negative is that the hotel has only stairs and not elevator and if you cannot walk stairs you can't stay here, have in mind that the breakfast areas is on 4rth floor. Off course the hotel staff help every time with bags to/from your room.

title: Safe choise in all cities
text: Another Hard Rock experience...Highily recommend especially if youâ€™re just arriving in a city and you're unsure for your first meal is a safe choise. Logical prices, nice food even for kids and amazing coctails.

title: Nice shopping experience
text: This oulet is an outdoor shopping mall and is quite bif!! I've spent over 5 hours exploring, shopping and having lunch. There is a really big playground area that kids absolutely love. Highly recommend this place to shop and kill some time. Is very close to airport and to attica zoo.

title: Best of the best
text: One of the best ice cream that i tried in my life...i like it very much. It has amazing tastes to try. Don't miss it

title: Like it very much
text: I tried the thrakiotiko bread with souvlaki and was amazing. One of the best that i tried on my holidays. Big portion and very good prices. Give it a try!

title: Not as expected
text: I had a lunch at the bistro and tried the hamburger. The burger was average but the bread was hard and no fresh. The portion in not very big so i think is overpriced. I get a little dissapointed because i expect the food into this cultural center to be very nice and get what you pay for.

title: So glad i visited it!
text: After my visit to S. Niarchos foundation cultural centre i rent a bike and drive to Averof museum. The entry fee is very cheap (3euro) and the ship is in excellent condition. Inside the ship the historical exhibits were amazing. You can see where and how the sailors crew live, eat and sleep on the boat, their uniforms, old photos, letters, etc

title: Don't miss it
text:
A modern building that houses the Opera House and the National Library of Greece. When i saw the library i get amazed was unbelievable with a lot of cpaces to sit, relax and read books. There is also a foam carpet for the kids to sit and read books also.
You can get the elevator to have a great view of Pireaus harbour and to see how big the park of cultural centre is. The building has coffee shop on the roof. There is also a restarant/coffee shop at the ground floor. The food is overprice and the burger that i ate wasn't so good.
The building surrounded by park, fountains and oil trees. There you can walk, bike, coffee, gym, etc. There is also free wifi. Don't lose it especially with kids
Is very close from the center of Athens and found out that from Suntagma square to the Cultural center (and back) every 30min you can take free shuttle. So dont take the public bus the shuttle is very best and takes you to the cultural centre at about 20min.
Stay to the cultural centre until you see the dancing waves into the fountains surrounded by classical music

title: Best souvlaki
text: Is located in a very nice area in Monastiraki and we sit outside where you can see Acropolis. I tried the chicken souvlaki and was tastefull and the portion was big also. The prices all ok. The inside decor is very nice and the staff helpfull and polit

title: Love the kebab
text: Visit it last week and i tried their kebab in pita...nice kebab, big portion and logical prices. The staff is very polite...the only negative is the saganaki cheese i tried and i didn't like it at all

title: Into Halloween decor
text: In the centre of Athens you can find this coffee/desert shop...Most of the people stand outside just to see the decor outside and the nearby area (love the hanging umbrellas). I sit outside and order milkshake with donut and ice cream...of course i couldn't eat all the portion. Is a little bit pricy of course but deserve it especially if you have kids...the decor it's gonna blow their minds. Now it's Halloween theme but they change the decor and every time is so good with so many details. The staff is pleasant and very polite.

title: Tastefull plates
text: Their burgers are amazing, also i tried the meat platter and liked very much too. Big and nice selection of beers. The atmosphere is cool and i enjoy see football maches there.

title: Nice meeting point
text: I like Monastiraki square cos is the meeting point for everyone and everything. Is surrounded by market, shops cafe, restaurants and is full of people. The only negative is a little bit dirty and full of graffiti, not good ones

title: Historical place with amazing views
text: First of all I found the ticket price very expensive...ok when you Â´re tourist you gonna paid to see the acropolis for one time buy I think that the price is prohibited for locals. Leave that behind and the spectacle with compensate you...Parthenon is amazing, also the Karyatides, women status will surprise you.Don't miss it

title: Amazing history point
text: The museum is big enough if you have in mind that the sculptures and marbles are only from Acropolis...you need at about one hour to see it and if you watch all the small movies about the history of acropolis you gonna need another half hour. The entry price is reasonable, also the bookstore prices. The prices of souvenirs in souvenir shop I think are overpriced. I recommended the visit

title: Basic food
text: I tried kebab and was good...not something amazing. The portion is good enough..the waiter were friendly

title: Friendly atmosphere with amazing food
text: I visited it for the first time although I have come to the village many times and feel like i found a gem. We had lunch and all the plates were delicious, cook and serve with village products, fresh potatoes, homemade burgers and pizza not sheltered. The portions are very good. Excellent service and polite staff. Recommended especially for tourists to taste traditional cyprus food and best hospitality. I' ll come back for sure

title: Lovely stay into mountains
text: First time visit the hotel after the renovation...the room is nice, with flat tv on the wall, fridge etc. The renovation in the bathroom is very good and well decorated. The breakfast was overflowing for 3* hotel like it very much. The terrace outside is adorable especially now in autumn for coffee and is close to kids playground...so when we had our coffee the kids enjoy into the playground. The lady in kids area is very polite and good with children as all the staff of the hotel. About the wifi that is free is only in public areas. Generaly we had a nice staying

title: Nice view - worth a visit
text: If you visiting the old Nicosia's streets the tower worth a visit.... the entrance fee is low and you can see the entire Nicosia all around....inside there a small photo exhibition

title: Into the heart of Nicosia
text: When you visit old Nicosias street you can't miss the Faneromeni square...The church is builded in the square and now is surrounded by coffee shops, restaurants, shops, etc so it can't be missed

title: Into the heart of Nicosia
text: Visit it if you are in the center of Nicosia old city...one of the oldest church in island...the morning hours is open

title: Great museum
text: Not very big but with great collections from all over Cyprus through the years. Visit it and wont miss... you need about 2 hrs into the museum
